DOC.brief_summary: Due increase number patient admit emergency department , many patient evaluate immediately admission . The function `` triage liaison physician '' introduce Spring 2015 . The objective study evaluate impact new function patient ' flow ED .
DOC.detailed_description: Geneva University Hospitals ( GUH ) emergency department ( ED ) admit 64000 patient every year . These patient triaged use Swiss Emergency Triage Scale ( SETS ) , 4-level triage scale . The SETS impose time objective first medical evaluation ( 20 minute SETS 2 , 2 hour SETS 3 ) . In 2014 , 60 % level-2 63 % level-3 emergency evaluate within 20 120 minute respectively . A triage liaison physician introduce Spring 2015 mission help triage nurse decision evaluate quickly patient immediately instal ED evaluation room . The objective study evaluate impact triage liaison physician time first medical evaluation .
DOC.criteria: > = 16 admit GUH ED patient triaged outpatient clinic
